attributes.action: withdraw Britains support for the appointment of Tony Blair as Middle East envoy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For this crucial position to be both effective and accepted by the people of the middle east and beyond, it requires an individual with unbiased judgement and a political distance from events thus far. Tony Blair's appointment can only be perceived as inflammatory and counterproductive and the Prime Minister should strongly reconsider his and the Governments support for Tony Blair's appointment to this post.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
